subject: Football
lead_paragraph: The Jets released veteran running back Kevan Barlow Wednesday after he ran for a career-low 370 yards last season — third on the team — and averaged just 2.8 yards per carry.
snippet: The Jets released veteran running back Kevan Barlow Wednesday after he ran for a career-low 370 yards last season — third on the team — and averaged just 2.8 yards per carry.
